nodes.text: A Mysterious Shrine, also known as a Force Shrine was a mysterious monument constructed by an unknown group of people at some point during galactic history. They were built on places strong in the Force and contained no known entrances or inside chambers. Identical structures could be found on a number of worlds across the galaxy and are known to be found on Dathomir, Dantooine, Yavin 4, Naboo, Rori, Tatooine, Lok, Corellia, Talus and Endor.

Mysterious Shrines appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies and provided a place for Force-sensitive player characters to meditate. They could be found on all of the planets in Star Wars Galaxies, except for Kashyyyk and Mustafar (the two planets added to the game by expansion packs).
